Reference

All functions

FBCanalysis

FBCanalysis: A package for developing and evaluating biomedical time series data clustering models based on Fluctuation Based Clustering (FBC)

add_clust2enrich()

Add clustering assignments to extended data

add_clust2ts()

Add clustering assignments to time series data

add_enrich()

Add extended data

clValid_flow()

Cluster validation measure analysis workflow

clust_matrix()

Cluster Earth Mover's Distance Matrix

emd_heatmap()

Visualize an Earth Mover's Distance Square Matrix as a heatmap

emd_matrix()

Generate Earth Mover's Distance Matrix

enr_obs_clust()

Observe a specific cluster of interest

init_clValid()

Initialize Cluster Validation Measure Analysis

jaccard_run_emd()

Simulate random data removal range via Earth Mover's Distance Cognate Cluster cluster assignment approach

jaccard_run_emd_2()

Simulate random data removal range via alternative Earth Mover's Distance Cognate Cluster cluster assignment approach

jaccard_run_global()

Simulate random data removal range via Global Cognate Cluster cluster assignment approach

max_fluc()

Determine pair of maximum fluctuation difference

patient_boxplot()

Visualize patient time series data in boxplot

patient_hist()

Visualize patient time series data in histogram

patient_list()

Process patient time series data

patient_ts_plot()

Visualize patient data in time series plot

reap_freq()

Determine reappearance frequency

reap_freq_run()

Determine reappearance frequency for range

rnd_dat_rm()

Randomly remove data from time series data list

sim_jaccard_emd()

Simulate random data removal via Earth Mover's Distance Cognate Cluster cluster assignment approach

sim_jaccard_emd_2()

Simulate random data removal via alternative Earth Mover's Distance Cognate Cluster cluster assignment approach

sim_jaccard_global()

Simulate random data removal via Global Cognate Cluster cluster assignment approach

sim_sample_enr()

Simulate random sampling in extended data

znorm()

z-normalise data
